job_purpose: Join a collaborative and forward-thinking environment at FocusNet Technology to play a key role in delivering digital and marketing outcomes across the business.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Build, maintain, and update websites primarily using WordPress
Configure and customize themes/plugins to meet design and functionality requirements
Ensure sites are responsive, performant, and compatible across browsers/devices
Manage hosting environments, perform site migrations, and configure DNS settings, SSL certificates, and backup systems
Integrate websites with CRMs, APIs, and third-party tools
Apply SEO best practices to site builds and ongoing improvements
Monitor and improve website speed, technical SEO performance, and cybersecurity
Utilize AI tools for coding, debugging, documentation, and optimization tasks
required_qualifications: At least 2 years of experience in website development with a focus on WordPress
Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, PHP, and basic JavaScript
Experience with web hosting, DNS, SSL, and server configurations
Familiarity with integrating websites into broader systems like CRMs, APIs, or marketing platforms
Working knowledge of SEO fundamentals and tracking/analytics tools
Security-first mindset and awareness of data privacy obligations
preferred_qualifications: Tertiary qualification in Web Development or related field
Portfolio of WordPress-based websites demonstrating technical ability and problem-solving approach
company_details: FocusNet Technology is a Perth-based company delivering tailored IT solutions, cybersecurity, cloud services, and digital strategy to clients nationwide. The company values thoughtful execution, clear communication, respect for the craft, and continuous improvement.
